Name: Singapore Sling (Raffles Formula)
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first eight ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.
History: For more Singapore Sling recipes and the cocktails full story, see our Singapore Sling page .
Nutrition: One serving of Singapore Sling (Raffles Formula) contains 247 calories
